title: General
fullText: The boat's changeover switch shall be provided with an indicator in order to show when the shore supply is energized. The boat's a.c. neutral shall be arranged to be earthed only at the shore supply when the shore supply is switched to supply the boat's a.c. system (i.e. the boat's a.c. neutral shall be disconnected from the boat's earth when shore power is not connected by a transformer or a converter that provides isolation between shore and ship power supply).
